rows.label: qev070305_MSG0001
rows.name:
Damn them! Those two-bit punks cut my Miramobile's
power lines in an attempt to strand me here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0002
rows.name:
Sorry, but it's going to take a little while to patch this
up. Would you keep a lookout forâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0003
rows.name:
No need to bother repairing that, Professor.
It can't help you now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0004
rows.name:
You're off to a VIP engagement, and I've got your
invite loaded right here in my clip.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0005
rows.name:
Hmph. I'm not interested in any party you're throwing.
I've got things to do. Go there yourself![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0006
rows.name:
...You scientists are a sad lot. You can peer into the
murkiest mysteries and see solutions, but you can't even
recognize your own death barreling toward you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0007
rows.name:
Or did you think that flimsy excuse for a BLADE stands
a chance against my partner, Dolba the Wrecker?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0008
rows.name:
Oh, I think [ST:playername ] is more than you
lot can even begin to handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0009
rows.name:
I would think you'd know that better than most,
after having lost to [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] so many times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0010
rows.name:
Then why not let [ST:gender p1=him p2=her ] choose how this goes down?
What is life, after all, but a series of decisions?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0011
rows.name:
Will it be: A) Kill the egghead, swear allegiance to me,
and assume that my good nature will lead me to spare
your life?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0012
rows.name:
Or B) Join the good professor here as a co-star in
Dolba the Wrecker's magical murder show?
He's not nice, by the way, so it's likely to hurt a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0013
rows.name: Now then! Which'll it be?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_JNK0010
rows.name: Choose Option C[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_SEL0011
rows.name: Make Gadd pay.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_JNK0020
rows.name: Choose Option D[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_SEL0021
rows.name: Show mercy, forgive Gadd, and invite him to join you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0014
rows.name:
Too stupid to reason with, eh?
Then on with the magical murder show![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0015
rows.name:
Idiocy pushed this far is practically an art! As thanks
for that enlightening display, we'll return in kind.
Welcome to the magical murder show![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0016
rows.name:
All right, Dolba! Use your overwhelming force to escort
these idiots to the VIP party![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0017
rows.name:
We're going home alive, [ST:playername ].
Whatever it takes, kid![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev070305_MSG0018
rows.name:
And once we get back, I'm going to make a massive
lineup of new products and get filthy rich off of them!
No mercy to anyone who gets in the way of my plan![ST:wait ]
